root.name: Travel Bug
root.description: OverviewTravel Bug is a free to play pet raising sim for the PlayStation Vita by Lucid Games. It lets the player hatch and outfit a little bug, and then send it out into the world to other users over the Vita's near service. The player can then track the bug's route on a map as it travels and receive photos of it taken by its current host, or take in and care for bugs created by others.The game was released in Europe on November 28, 2012. A North American release date has yet to be announced.
